summary: Create a portfolio/business website for Bhatoa Traders (government school general products supplier) showcasing company info, work experience, products categories, service area, and contact details.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Simple modern wordmark logo reading “Bhatoa Traders”, clean vector-like look, minimal icon hinting at school supplies/commerce (bhatoa-traders-logo.dim_512x512.png) 512x512
- Wide hero banner illustration with abstract school-supply motifs (notebooks, pens, furniture silhouettes) in a professional warm palette (bhatoa-traders-hero.dim_1600x600.png) 1600x600

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page business/portfolio website for “Bhatoa Traders” with clear navigation and sections: Hero, About, Work Experience, Products We Supply (grouped categories), Why Choose Bhatoa Traders, Service Area, and Contact.

Populate the website content using the provided business details: company description (government school general products supplier), owner name (Harsimrat Singh Bhatoa), experience (5 years), product categories (Stationery, Cleaning & Maintenance, Sports, School Furniture) with example items, work experience client types, “Why Choose” bullet points, service area description, and contact phone/WhatsApp number (9464003009).
Add clear contact call-to-actions: a click-to-call phone link and a WhatsApp link using the provided number, displayed prominently in the Hero section and again in the Contact section.

Establish a coherent visual theme and apply it consistently across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling). Use a professional, trustworthy style appropriate for a government-school supplier; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.

Add basic on-page SEO and metadata for the business: document title “Bhatoa Traders”, meta description summarizing government school supply services, and accessible semantic headings for each section.
Include generated static brand visuals (logo and a hero banner illustration) in the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them on the website.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a Bhatoa Traders portfolio/business website with sections: About, Work Experience, Products We Supply (categories), Why Choose Us, Service Area, and Contact details.
Add images/branding to the website (e.g., logo and hero banner) and integrate them into the site design.

Generate and add the Bhatoa Traders branding image assets to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames and dimensions specified in the project image requirements.
